title: Rep. Hayes questions ‘non-educator’ Betsy DeVos’ role in school reopening decisions
description: Rep. Jahana Hayes (D-CT), a former national teacher of the year, tells NBC’s Kasie Hunt that she hopes Education Secretary Betsy DeVos defers to “the people who know best” as the Trump administration pushes for schools to reopen this fall.
source.name: MSNBC

title: Sen. Kaine on next relief package: ‘We'll get a bill done before the end of July’
description: With extra unemployment benefits set to run out at the end of the month, Senator Tim Kaine (D-VA), tells NBC’s Kasie Hunt, “The Senate GOP and White House have a sense of urgency about doing something and I expect that we will get a bill done.”
source.name: MSNBC

title: Two years later: Family separations at the border
description: MSNBC Correspondent Jacob Soboroff was among the first reporters to get an inside look at border patrol detention centers during the family separation crisis in 2018. He talks to NBC’s Kasie Hunt about his new book full of fresh reporting on the topic,
source.name: MSNBC

title: Jason Isbell: 'Sometimes I just break down in tears because I miss playing rock & roll with my band'
description: With music venues and studios shuttered, artists are finding new ways to get their music to fans. Troubadour Jason Isbell discusses parenting amid a pandemic and the loss of his mentor John Prine.
source.name: MSNBC

author: NBCNews.com
title: With families home and economy cratering, traditional gender roles seep in
description: In the growing “She-Cession” — a one-two punch from the pandemic and economic recession — many women are scaling back their professional work to take on household responsibilities, Ali Vitali reports.

title: Rather: America world laughing stock for coronavirus response
